Remote, Ruby on Rails developer, Triggit

We are looking for a full overhaul of our client facing Ruby on Rails administration interface. We already use cutting edge technology, and we have a need for a fast and feature full site. By cutting edge, we mean the latest web technologies including websockets, AngularJS, Rails, and Redis.

This position is 100% remote and will require strong communication skills, video chat availability, and a strong work ethic with dedication. We coordinate with IRC, Github, and other tools to execute effectively.

Apply at: https://hire.jobvite.com/j?cj=oZVMYfwo&s=hacker_news
